gcc -std=c18 -Wall -lm -Wextra -O2 -g  -static CMakeFiles/Algorithms_in_C.dir/src/sort/bubble_sort.c.o CMakeFiles/Algorithms_in_C.dir/src/sort/insertion_sort.c.o CMakeFiles/Algorithms_in_C.dir/src/sort/main.c.o CMakeFiles/Algorithms_in_C.dir/src/sort/merge_sort.c.o CMakeFiles/Algorithms_in_C.dir/src/sort/quick_sort.c.o CMakeFiles/Algorithms_in_C.dir/src/sort/selection_sort.c.o CMakeFiles/Algorithms_in_C.dir/src/utils/utils.c.o -o Algorithms_in_C  -lm
